sense.def: PC, Combined Designation of conditions of yong 癰 , obstruction-illnesses, and ju 疽 , impediment-illnesses. Ji yan bei ju fang 集驗背疽方 Lun fu bu huan jin zheng qi san 論服不換金正氣散：疽 疾將安之際，合多服加料十全湯，以補其氣血，使易生肌肉故也 , “When the ailment of an impediment - illness comes close to being healed, it is advisable to consume large quantities of the ‘decoction with added ingredients that is always successful’ to supplement the [patient’s] qi and blood. The reason is that this will easily generate new muscles and flesh”.
